column1:
Loom video overview and context.
Standard assumptions: 
- Workshops, PLCs, and Deep Dives have a prep/delivery ratio of 4/1
- Coaching has a prep/delivery ratio of 1.5/1
Evaluation (Yellow fields) are not multiplied when programs are scaled.
All other fields (Programmatic components (White) and the aligned travel level (blue)) should be scaled in accordance with the increase from the standard package
column5:

Coaching and Admin meetings 1.5/1

column3: Standard base package terms

1 day, 6 hours delivery + 2 hours set-up/tear down
(Delivery = 6 hours

Total = 32 hours)

column3: Added in 4 hour blocks, one hour between each session

Survey Design/Revision (16 hours)
Survey Administration - Educators, Students, and Community/Caregivers (8 hours)
Focus Group Design and Revision (8 hours)
Focus Group Admin (8 hours) *lf FGâ€™s take more than 8 hours, we charge in 4 hour increments @ $165/hr
Focus Groups should be facilitate virtually. Each participant should have their own device.

Based on 15 teacher sample size
Observation an analysis of current teacher practice on WS yearly rubrics (estimated at 45 min per teacher, with a cap of 8 teacher/day/PLF. 15x45 min= 11.25 hours)
Review of curricular and planning documents (estimated at 45 min per teacher x 15 teachers = 11.25 hours)
Prep and analysis at 1.5/1 ratio (22.5x1.5 = 33.75 hours)
Total = 56.25, rounded down to 56
Survey, focus group, and teacher observation data aggregated and report creation = 40 hours
